mapper.update: UPDATE user_submitted SET contract=#{contract} WHERE id=#{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM common_videos_table WHERE common_id=#{userId} AND videos=#{studentClass}
mapper.select: SELECT us.id,cu.classname personName,us.sex,us.age,us.person_user,am.`name` agent,us.contract,ct.type_name studentClass,us.`status`,us.create_time,us.update_time FROM user_submitted us INNER JOIN agent_management am ON am.id=us.agent INNER JOIN class_type ct ON ct.id=us.student_class INNER JOIN common_user cu ON cu.id=us.person_name where us.id=#{userId}
SELECT number totalQuantity,qty numberOfUse,rqty remainingOrder FROM orders WHERE id=#{ordersId} AND `status`=1
